name: state-fabric
description: JS Immutable State, Event and Action framework with cursors

scripts.build: mkdirp build && browserify ./src/fabric.js -t [babelify --loose all] -s Fabric -o ./build/fabric.js && uglifyjs ./build/fabric.js -c -m -o ./build/fabric.min.js && node ./scripts/banner.js
scripts.check: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build
